page.title: 04HOUSING - REIGATE/REDHILL
page.content: Good communications, employment opportunities & lovely countryside have helped create high demand for housing.Properties vary from Victorian terraces & villas to big post-war detached houses with large sites & magnificent views. There is some pre- Victorian property; virtually no high density modern development, & 3 small council estates in the{eastern zone. { }The M25 runs through the semi-rural {northern area. }The{central zone}has some of the most expensive housing; select properties near the Downs may exceed Â£350,000 in price. The{southern zone}contains the 2 town centres.Reigate seems more highly regarded & prices tend to decline from west to east - Redhill generally being slightly cheaper. Some properties in the south east sell for c.Â£40,000. The area is overall desirable & affluent.
